response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while providing you with a remarkable opportunity to own something truly special. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable item with you.", "product_price": 750000}
